The Changcheng No. 6 Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Otog Front Banner of Ordos City, Inner Mongolia

province: 内蒙古自治区 (Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region)

operators: 鄂托克前旗长城六号矿业有限公司 (Otog Front Banner Changcheng No.6 Mining Company)

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Otog Front Banner Changcheng No.6 Mining Company, which is fully owned by Shandong Energy.
